detail_desc: Blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, sewn-in ties at the top, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined, triangle cups. Elasticated seam under the bust and at the waist, and a lined gusset.
Mules with a wide foot strap in plastic. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 6.5 cm.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with worn details, a button fly, slit at the back and raw-edge hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Jazz trousers in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with concealed elastication, and straight-cut legs with flared hems.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Wrapover V-neck, a concealed zip at the back, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Inset band with pleating at the waist and a flared, softly draping skirt. Partly lined.
Metal hoop earrings with a small plastic bead. Length 3.8 cm.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a reflective appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Fully lined bikini top with a shimmering metallic finish, wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem. No fasteners.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, elastication at the back and buttons at the sides. Seams on the legs with decorative buttons, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Soft velour bootees with embroidery and appliqués, foldover ribbing at the top and jersey linings. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Flared, calf-length skirt in crinkled jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in wrapover.
Cardigan in a soft, chunky knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a terry motif on the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, boxy shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.

Sleeveless dress with a top in cotton jersey and skirt in woven fabric. Open chest pocket with an embroidered detail on the front, patch side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
Glittery ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front, elastic strap over the foot and grosgrain trim around the top. Satin insoles.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide legs with decorative turn-ups at the hems.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Cotton seersucker shirt with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.

All-in-one pyjamas in a double layer of organic cotton jersey with one pattern on the outside and one on the inside. Long sleeves, long legs with ribbed hems, and press studs down the front that continue down one leg.
Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with a knee-high shaft, and elastication and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Seam at the waist with a wide tie that creates a draped effect and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy weave with glittery threads. V-neck, a seam with a wide panel under the bust, and a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed press-studs. Zip fly with concealed press-studs at the front of the waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs. Lined with shorts in woven fabric.
Push-up triangle bikini top with frills at the front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Hat in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ties under the chin and earflaps. Jersey lining.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
T-shirt in striped, airy linen jersey with a round neckline.
V-neck dress in a viscose weave with an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a text motif on the front.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back, short, narrow shoulder straps and short slits in the sides.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.

Non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist, gently flared skirt and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Lined wrapover bikini top with long ties, lined triangular cups with removable inserts, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Fitted, knee-length dress in stretch cotton twill with buttons all the way down the front and a seam at the waist.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a chest pocket. Regular fit.

Chinos in a soft cotton weave containing some linen and viscose with elastication at the back of the waist, a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hair elastics with a decorative bow and no metal clips.
Cardigan in a soft, textured cotton knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights with a glittery pattern. 50 denier.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Pull-on jeans in washed, superstretch denim with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Lightweight puffer jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh sections at the back of the knees, and a print motif and reflective details on one leg.
Loose-fitting, long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Top in satin with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and spaghetti straps.
Bracelets in various sizes and designs.
Short-sleeved top in an airy mulberry silk weave with a round neckline and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Short, fitted jacket dress in a crêpe weave with peak lapels, a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in jersey made from a modal blend with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck, buttons at the top and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a partially reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Waist bag in imitation leather with a soft suede front. Adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle, an outer compartment with a zip that has a braided tab, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 3.5 cm, height 16 cm, width 28 cm.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Soft jersey top in a relaxed fit with short sleeves.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
